bibl.title: The Papyri from Nessana and the End of Nabataean and Byzantine Settlements in the Negev. [En hébreu, avec résumé en anglais.]
Studies in the Archaeology and History of Ancient Israel in Honour of Moshe Dothan
bibl.author: NEGEV, Avraham

bibl.note: The editor of P. Ness. III, 39 (mid-VI?) concluded that this was a partial list of sites together with a record of taxes imposed on land property. The present author suggests that the sums of money listed form the support funds which the imperial authorities transferred to the militia units stationed in the 9 fortified cities.
